displayAddress: SWANFIELD ROAD, WALTHAM CROSS, HERTFORDSHIRE, EN8
detailedDescription: KAVANAGH PROPERTIES is thrilled to present this exquisite modern 1-bedroom apartment, complete with a stylish bathroom and the added convenience of a private parking space. To add to the flair of this apartment, it comes with a Juliet-style balcony. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Waltham Cross, this stunning residence is less than a 5-minute stroll away from the bustling Shopping Centre. You'll experience the perfect blend of comfort and accessibility in this enviable location! Imagine stepping outside your front door to discover a wealth of shopping, dining, and entertainment options at your fingertips. Plus, with close proximity to both bus and train stations, you're only moments away from seamless travel to London, Hertfordshire, and Essex. Whether you're commuting for work or exploring the sights, this apartment offers an unbeatable lifestyle. This property presents a versatile opportunity: Buy it to create your dream home, or invest in a lucrative rental opportunity. Whichever path you choose, you'll be making a wise decision in a location that promises growth and prosperity and the added bonus for this property is that it comes with a 990 year lease. Beyond its convenient amenities, Waltham Cross boasts a tranquil atmosphere that is perfect for families. Enjoy the serenity of suburban living while still being well-connected to the vibrant energy of London. This family-friendly environment ensures safety and community spirit, making it an ideal place to settle down. With easy access to major trunk roads including the A10, M25, and M11, this apartment is not just a home; it's a gateway to the best of both worlds. Specification as follows: All sizes in feet: Open living area: 18.7 X 9.4 bedroom: 10.7 X 9.1 bathroom: 7.7 X 3.3 lounge: 8.8 X 3.6 Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity! Schedule a viewing today to experience the modern charm and prime location of this remarkable apartment. Located in Enfield, this 3-bedroom end terrace property offers a practical living space with one bathroom and one reception room. The property is part-furnished, providing flexibility for tenants. Key features include off-road parking and a large garden, ideal for outdoor activities. The property benefits from gas central heating with a combi boiler, ensuring efficient heating throughout the home. Inside, the property boasts double bedrooms, providing ample space for residents. The kitchen is equipped with essential appliances and offers access to the garden, enhancing the indoor-outdoor flow. The reception room is well-sized, providing a comfortable area for relaxation and entertainment. The bathroom is fitted with modern fixtures, including a bathtub and a shower. The property’s layout is designed for convenience, with easy access to all rooms. The large garden offers a private outdoor space, perfect for enjoying the outdoors. Enfield is a well-connected area with various amenities, including shops, schools, and public transport options. The property’s location provides easy access to local services and facilities, making it a convenient choice for residents. The energy performance certificate (EPC) details are available upon request, ensuring transparency regarding the property’s energy efficiency. Overall, this end terrace property in Enfield offers a practical and comfortable living space with essential features and amenities. Deposit amount : £3,109.60
